abstract: British Prime Min David Cameron is berated by members of his own party, who say that leader has done nothing to stop the European Union from siphoning money, sovereignty and authority from Britain.
snippet: Members of David Cameron’s own Conservative Party accused him of doing nothing to stop the European Union from unfairly siphoning money, sovereignty and authority from Britain.
lead_paragraph: Members of David Cameron’s own Conservative Party accused him of doing nothing to stop the European Union from unfairly siphoning money, sovereignty and authority from Britain.

headline.main: Cameron Faces Internal Revolt Over European Policy
headline.print_headline: Cameron Faces Internal Revolt Over European Policy
headline.seo: David Cameron Berated by His Own Party Over E.U.
